attributes.action: Replace Cafcass  organisation by the parental alienation specialist
attributes.additional_details: False statements and lack of knowledge of child development of those people make suffer child's involve in Family Court Cases
attributes.background: Stop making any decision of Cafcass organisation and be charge or false statements

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about the role of the Child and Family Court Advisory and Support Service (CAFCASS), however it's not clear whether you want a parental alienation specialist to take on every responsibility CAFCASS holds, or simply to manage CAFCASS's consideration of claims of parental alienation.

You might like to sign this petition which calls for a related action:

Review and reform the family court system to ensure equal treatment: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601404
